<<<<<<< HEAD
A most excellent and rare drink, pleasant and profitable for young and old people, that may be administered at all times, ... J. H.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
s.n., [London : 1650]
Title from opening lines of text. Imprint from Wing. Annotation on Thomason copy: "London. And at the signe of the golden lion in the long walke between christ church and Snt. Bartholowmews hospitall". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
